EmailTemplate.name: PR Request No
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI! We have been so flattered by the number of requests that we have been receiving around this and we are honored that you thought of us. While we are unable to personally respond to every inquiry, we do review all proposals & requests, and we will contact the programs that we are able to support.
We appreciate you and wish you the best of luck in all of your future adventures.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
